name: ElijahThinksAKid'sViewonLife
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Elijah Thinks: A Kid's View on Life is a kid produced podcast that shares funny jokes, life stories and questions to ponder from a precocious pre-teen. Right now Elijah is into Sharks, Medieval Knights, American Football, Acting Classes, reading Big Nate and writing his own Epic Novel. Parents and kids will want to join him as he shares a unique kid's view on life in the internet age. Who else but a kid would notice which style socks the Bronoc's wore for the last home game?
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
